response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than just its price tag. Considering its significance to you, I propose an offer of $18,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the exceptional service and support we provide to ensure its successful integration into your operations. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your business.", "product_price": 18000}
